name: data
description:
Read a page of data from a table in the project's Convex deployment.

Output:
- page: A page of results from the table.
- isDone: Whether there are more results to read.
- continueCursor: The cursor to use to read the next page of results.

deploymentSelector.description: Deployment selector (from the status tool) to read data from.

tableName.description: The name of the table to read from.

order.description: The order to sort the results in.

cursor.description: The cursor to start reading from.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to return, defaults to 100.
